attributes.action: more rights for fathers of seperated couples.
attributes.additional_details: to give fathers who are in a separated relationship more rights. mothers have the say if the father can see his children, where they go to school, and have no legal backing when it comes to their up bringing. good fathers are missing out on their kids as the mothers use them as pawns to get their own way. and we get blamed for not being around?? that's not fair. we need more rights so that we can be.
